## IParameters interface

Interface for plugin parameters

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [enableLinkTracking?](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.enablelinktracking.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Enable/disable link click tracking, defaults to true |
|  [rememberConsent?](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.rememberconsent.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Remember consent |
|  [requireConsent?](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.requireconsent.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Requires user consent before sending events |
|  [router](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.router.md) |  | Router | Vitepress router component |
|  [siteID](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.siteid.md) |  | number | Matomo numeric site ID of the site you want to track |
|  [trackerJsFile?](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.trackerjsfile.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Name of the js file to call on the matomo server |
|  [trackerPhpFile?](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.trackerphpfile.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Name of the php file to call on the matomo server |
|  [trackerUrl](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.trackerurl.md) |  | string | URL where the piwik.php/piwik.js files can be found |
